name: mezon-automation
description: Automation Framework with Playwright + Page Object Model

scripts.test:setup:
npx playwright test --project setup && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
scripts.test:bdd:
npx bddgen && npx playwright test --project chromium-bdd-login --project chromium-bdd-no-auth --project chromium-bdd-auth && echo '
To open last HTML report run:

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'

npx playwright test --project chromium-no-bdd && echo '

\033[32mnpm run report\033[0m
'
